param.name: Output Folder
param.dialogReference: This is the output folder for the detected delamination polygon file.

param.name: spectral_detail
param.dialogReference: During the image segmentation process this sets the level importance given to the spectral differences of features in the imagery. A default value is set to 20 but valid values range from 1.0 to 20.0. A higher value is appropriate when the features are spectrally similar. Smaller values create smoother outputs. If the output does not identify enough features, then raise the value. If it identifies too many features then lower the value.

param.name: spatial_detail
param.dialogReference: During the image segmentation process this sets the level importance given to the spatial differences of features in the imagery. A default value is set to 20 but valid values range from 1.0 to 20.0. A higher value is appropriate when the features are spatially similar. Smaller values create smoother outputs. If the output does not identify enough features, then raise the value. If it identifies too many features then lower the value.

param.name: min_segment_size
param.dialogReference: The minimum size of the raster object that will be output from the image segmentation process. Area is measured in no units but the pixel itself. The default value is set to 100.
